dtliExcerpt: Why does everyone hate us? Where can we go that’s safe? These stubbornly open-ended questions pop up repeatedly in Joshua Harmon’s piercing and pointedly amusing Prayer for the French Republic, now on Broadway following its 2022 Off-Broadway premiere.

keyPhrases.quote: stubbornly open-ended questions pop up repeatedly
